Package out.production.airlaib.test

Class ViewTicketTest

java.lang.Object
out.production.airlaib.test.ViewTicketTest
public class ViewTicketTest extends Object
JUnit test class for the viewTicket class. Author: Abdullah Tahir Testing strategy for the ViewTicket class. Partition the inputs as follows: 1. Case when a record is found (positive case): - Set up a mock connection to return a record when queried. - Call proceedBtnAction with a valid ticket ID. - Verify that the billing window is opened and visible. 2. Case when a record is not found (negative case): - Set up a mock connection to not return a record when queried. - Call proceedBtnAction with a nonexistent ticket ID. - Verify that the billing window is null. Note: The testing strategy may evolve based on the actual implementation of the ViewTicket class.
